fr.inria.atlanmod.commons

Class LazyDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.commons.LazyDouble

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class LazyDouble
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that automatically loads a double by using a DoubleSupplier during the first call to getAsDouble().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAsDouble()
      Gets the wrapped value.
      void ifLoaded(java.util.function.DoubleConsumer consumer)
      If a value is loaded, invoke the specified consumer with the value, otherwise do nothing.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Returns true if the value has been loaded.
      static LazyDouble of(double value)
      Creates a new lazy double with the embed value.

      Unloads the wrapped value.

      Updates the wrapped value.

      Updates the wrapped value with a DoubleUnaryOperator.
      static LazyDouble with(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier loadFunction)
      Creates a new lazy double with the DoubleSupplier to load the embed value.

      • with

        @Nonnull
public static LazyDouble with(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier loadFunction)
        Creates a new lazy double with the DoubleSupplier to load the embed value.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a new lazy object

      • getAsDouble

        public double getAsDouble()
        Gets the wrapped value. On the first call, the object is created.
        Returns:
        the value

      • update

        Updates the wrapped value.

      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded()
        Returns true if the value has been loaded.
        Returns:
        true if the value has been loaded

      • ifLoaded

        public void ifLoaded(java.util.function.DoubleConsumer consumer)
        If a value is loaded, invoke the specified consumer with the value, otherwise do nothing.
        Parameters:
        consumer - action to be executed if a value is present

      • unload

        public void unload()
        Unloads the wrapped value. If the value is not loaded, then this method does nothing.
